title: Batman - LOTDK Special (2010) (c2c) (GreenGiant-DCP) [REP]
description:
This is a one-shot special that seems very hard to find and is not even in the MTCDC torrents from what I know of (if you don't know what I mean, search that term in the bar and you'll understand). Best I can tell, it has only been posted here as a single issue:


Anyway, it's a fun one-off worth reading if you are a fan of the Dark Knight. Since that torrent is dead, I thought I would repost this for anyone interested. Thanks to GreenGiant-DCP for the scans, please seed and enjoy! :-)
